item.description:
Continuing our Developer Panel series

6:00pm
Food

6:30pm
API Magic
Custom Fields, Custom Editors and Event Handlers

We're going to start slow with a common event handler: adjusting the Item.Name property. We will also look at how to extend Treelist to support Sitecore Query. We'd like to take time in this meeting to solve a problem that someone from the group is working on, so please bring your questions and examples. If we can develop it right there, we will!

Interest permitting, we'll close the evening with a tour of a deep Sitecore integration: a Sitecore-based calendar with recurring events. This solution features custom event handlers, a custom field, and a custom editor.
item.name: March 2010 Sitecore Meetup - API Magic - Technical Audience
